title: Account has been permanently banned, have no idea why
body:
Can someone from Riot Support please look into this and check into my current ticket.   The message in the email is vague as it only states, "Actions that have been performed on your account are in violation of the League of Legends Terms of Use."  

I have no idea as to what these "actions" are, would like an explanation and would like this to be resolved sometime before Fri Jan 01 00:00:00 UTC 2100(the end date of ban). 

I also suggest that if you're going to ban an account, you may want to be a little more detailed in the message that you're sending.

replies.body:
You guys have some really great customer service.  Top notch...

And just in case you couldn't tell, I'm totally being sarcastic.

Ok, so ticket placed yesterday at 13:54 Eastern and yet to have any comment made on it.  24 hours should have been long enough to at least have a rep comment on the ticket especially since the account is banned and cannot be logged to.   

Could someone please have a look at this ticket.
I already have a ticket open: TICKET #31194236  and have yet to receive a response on it.  I had opened it yesterday before I made this post.  Any way you can get someone to review it?
If this was the case, it may be a good idea to have the notification email detail this type of information.

When I went to investigate this account, it actually looks like this ban was most likely placed in order to help protect your account from any further damage, since our system detected that someone was possibly able to hack your account. Reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) by picking the option "I need help recovering my account" and you should be back on the Rift in no time.
